Retrieve available pipelines for deals

get_deal_pipelines.Rd

Retrieve available pipelines for deals

get_deal_pipelines(
  token_path = hubspot_token_get(),
  apikey = hubspot_key_get(),
  include_inactive = "EXCLUDE_DELETED"
)

Arguments

token_path

Path to OAuth 2.0 token. See hubspot_token_create().
apikey

API key to work with Hubspot (only used if token_path is NULL). See hubspot_key_set().
include_inactive

Should inactive entities be returned

Value

List with deal pipeline data

Details

Inactive pipelines are defined as deleted pipelines.

See also

Other getters: get_companies(), get_contact_properties(), get_contacts(), get_deal_properties(), get_owners()

Examples

pipelines <- get_deal_pipelines()
#> Warning: Selecting ‘env’ backend. Secrets are stored in environment variables
#> Could not find Hubspot API key, will use the 'demo' key.
#> Please run hubspot_key_set() to set your API key.
